name: Gardener (hungwei)
description:
A gardener plants flowers after each step and one wants to plant flowers in all pots and only in pots. The same flowers would follow the standard match-3 rule  even with more than 3 flowers are matched in a row. T-shape and L-shape matches are also available and when more than 5 flowers matched at the same time a bigger flower survives.

This is a hard game that requires you to discover some specific patterns of movement that could help you through the whole game. The modular 3 property is introduced naturally by match-3 rule that would prompt you to carefully calculate the state of player on board.

This is my first game on this platform and I tried to make the game self-contained. If the rule is still not clear please comment below and let me improve my games.
